      • registrationService

        @POST
 @Path(value="/RegistrationService")
public java.lang.String registrationService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                                                                         java.lang.String uname,
                                                                                         @FormParam(value="email")
                                                                                         java.lang.String email,
                                                                                         @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                                         java.lang.String pass)
        Registration Rest service, this service will be called to make registration. This function will store user data in data store
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        email - provided user email
        pass - provided password
        Returns:
        Status json

public java.lang.String loginService(@FormParam(value="uname")

                                                                           @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                           java.lang.String pass)
        Login Rest Service, this service will be called to make login process also will check user data and returns new user from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        user in json format
